name: Masked Shooters 2
description: Masked Shooters 2 puts you on the front line of a dangerous gunfight that can only end in victory or defeat; there will be no white flags to wave. As a covert ops soldier, you have access to advanced weapons that will blow your enemies away, if you know how to use them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600/AMD Phenom X3 8750 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 260/Radeon HD 4870 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 Processor: Intel Core I5 2500k/AMD FX 8350 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 670/Radeon HD 7870 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: single worst shooter i have ever played and managed to get every acheivment in 12 minutes on the only server on the only map
it's so bad it's good

5/10 -DNF A small game with big potential and i actually had fun playing it  i rarely get fps games like this that actually makes me say like  'hey this aint half bad just need to be polished like a little there at the right and there at the left and bam we have another huge shooter game in steam
Good game. The gameplay is good and funny. The graphic is unfortunately bad but ok. You can do achievements. And you can get trading cards.

Litte, fun game.  *3 maps (as i saw only 'Arena' get's played) *2 modes (deathmatch and team deathmatch) *9 weapons *you have all weapons at spawning *retro grafic  (saw some people downvoted and gave its grafic for a reason - that's FiretrUCK, never judge a game by its grafic only)  postive: +kinda fast gameplay +nice map design, i really like that colloseum map +good time filler +fast joining +fast leaving +easy archivements (got em' all in 2 hours)  negative: -no spawn protection -spawn positioning. It can happend that you spawn a second after someone else so you can kill him instandly, As I played the game this wasnt a point wich destroyed my game opinion but it isnt fair or good anyway. -the hitbox of the knife is terrible, in my 3 knife attemps i needed 5-7 hits to actuall hit the enemie  (anyway - you wont use the knife anyway) -maybe the price. I know 3€ isnt too mutch, but it feels like too mutch for this game. Get it at sale!   Thanks for reading - here's a knife, you wont hit somebody with, anyway:   ___________ __ |____ I._______.-'   (Sorry for my english)
well... the game isn't smooth as other FPS game... at least it is enjoyable ^_^
About the worst I've ever played. Dosen't even feel like a Alpha test game. Avoid at all cost.

Feels like '98  This game is good, and funny.Yeah, it's mostly unfinished and it gets boring quite fast, but hey! The developer tried and he's trying to do some games, or he just started progamming. It's a very nice game, and I had fun playing it  10/10  Plot twist: has a better singleplayer than infinite warfare

Got this for 10 cents
it's cool

CounterStrike...Ish?   This seems like something made on gamejam by a newcomer. Not much to brag about... But I like the hand grenade explotions though... That's a good thing, right?  Graphics are low-res, it's very CPU intensive (So expect some hot hands if you're playing this on a two-year old laptop... But that would be a plus if it's winter though), animations... Don't get me started. Not with the sounds either... Don't get me started on anything.  But hey. If it's on sale for 0.05$, buy it! You'll see some fancy grenade explotions

This game in a nutshell -------------------------  Buys game, then realises its a asset flip *shrugs it off to see what the players are like* finds a obnoxious kid saying ♥♥♥♥ like you are my ♥♥♥♥♥es. not to say that the weapons are unbalanced look at the rpg then compare it to an rpg in a game like cod witch somehow has more balenced explosives and gameplay the problem with giving the players all the weapons at the start is one a player with no skill could just pick up a rpg and ♥♥♥♥ all the players over a few minutes then when players are trying to play with weapons that arnt op they are at a huge disadvantage atleast add a buy system oh wait its an asset flip so that would take too much effort it feels like a free to play game on itch.io.
Crap graphic and sounds but still fun, i like that old school style :)  m79 with 8 ammo + rpg with 3 ammo = texas masacre
Very bad.

Nice little shooter!  I like that you have a variety of weapons, the controls are ok and It's fun for beginners. I would like to see more maps though!
Great game, lots of fun, just need some more maps 9/10
Ok, so, got all the steam achievements in 1h30, it's fun, 1€ is a correct price. (got it for free)
action game good
wait, this game is a sequel... does that mean there was a worse version of this at some point? oh god.

Okay so I dont really write reviews and all but for the support, I'm on it. Looks like someone have worked really hard on this game.  Pros-  1.Chunky yet funky If you have played FPS like Assult cube then you probs know how the shooting feels, The graphics at high looks much more better compared to AC. but the character models arre something to work on, Ofcos not CSGO character like quality but atleast CSS type but its still amazing.   2. Kind of Rail shooter if playing Deathmatch  3. NO economy ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥t, All weapons are free except few which can be unlocked in a mode.  4. Nice sound.  5. Realism environment.  6. Feels fresh.  Cons-  1. Glitches Oh my god, I character models which floats in the air like a ghost or something scares the ♥♥♥♥ outta me. But its no harm.  2. Character models yee. work on them  3. Only 3 maps while the 2 looks exactly same  4. ♥♥♥♥ing RPGs, Dont even think. The Bots runnin with RPGs to screw your ♥♥♥ up with one time hit.  5. No way to chat.  6. No players on servers. IDK.  But ignore all, Its really a cool game. And have hella potential to become best seller.
Game of the year!

I would not say that it is a great game, I would not say that's it's game play is great, but I will say that despite its many glitches and random jumping, I did enjoy playing it for the time I played it to get all the achievements... need about an hour to get them all... it is a nice play around game if you are just looking to kill time, but personally I think there are better games to waste time on... unless you get it for free, I don't think it is worth paying for...

Free for all deathmatch generator with small variety of weapons provided upon spawn. Easy achievements and trading cards. Completion in around an hour or less. Each round is around 6-8 minutes long, so shoot to your heart's content. If you don't mind the simplicity of the game, block graphics, small amount of players playing, three maps to choose from, this is the game to get especially if it was priced at ten cents on discount.
